==D APT Repository==

===d-apt download files section can act as an ATP repository.===
===This is helpful to easily install/upgrade D packages on Debian like systems.===


To enable it, just edit /etc/apt/sources.list and add the following line:

`deb http://d-apt.googlecode.com/files /`

The following packages are available:

 * dmd

Debianized source packages not available by the moment.
